mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T13_NOTICE ( NOTICE , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_TIME , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME , CREATE_PER ) VALUES ( #{nOTICE} , #{nOTICEDATE} , #{nOTICETIME} , #{lATITUDE} , #{lONGITUDE} , #{cREATEDATE} , #{cREATETIME} , #{cREATEPER} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T13_NOTICE SET NOTICE = #{nOTICE} , NOTICE_DATE = #{nOTICEDATE} , NOTICE_TIME = #{nOTICETIME} , LATITUDE = #{lATITUDE} , LONGITUDE = #{lONGITUDE} , CREATE_DATE = #{cREATEDATE} , CREATE_TIME = #{cREATETIME} , CREATE_PER = #{cREATEPER} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOTICE AS "nOTICE" , NOTICE_DATE AS "nOTICEDATE" , NOTICE_TIME AS "nOTICETIME" , LATITUDE AS "lATITUDE" , LONGITUDE AS "lONGITUDE" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" , CREATE_PER AS "cREATEPER" FROM T13_NOTICE WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOTICE AS "nOTICE" , NOTICE_DATE AS "nOTICEDATE" , NOTICE_TIME AS "nOTICETIME" , LATITUDE AS "lATITUDE" , LONGITUDE AS "lONGITUDE" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" , CREATE_PER AS "cREATEPER" FROM T13_NOTICE WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOTICE AS "nOTICE" , NOTICE_DATE AS "nOTICEDATE" , NOTICE_TIME AS "nOTICETIME" , LATITUDE AS "lATITUDE" , LONGITUDE AS "lONGITUDE" , CREATE_DATE AS "cREATEDATE" , CREATE_TIME AS "cREATETIME" , CREATE_PER AS "cREATEPER" FROM T13_NOTICE WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
